About Me

I am a PhD student studying Oceanography at the University of Washington under the joint supervision of Luc Rainville and Jim Thomson. I started at UW in 2017 after completing a masterâ€™s degree in applied science with a focus on environmental fluid mechanics in the Civil Engineering department at the University of British Columbia in Vancouver, BC. I previously completed a bachelors of applied science degree in Civil Engineering at UBC.

My interest and current focus is on small-scale processes and mixing in the upper ocean; more information can be found on my Research page. This website details my research interests and activities.
